thread.title: Flu Epidemic Shows Few Signs of Easing

author: Betsy McKay
title: Flu Epidemic Shows Few Signs of Easing

organizations.name: centers for disease control and prevention

text:
The flu season just keeps getting longerâ€”and harsher.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said on Friday that cases of influenza-like illness continued to rise in the week ending Jan. 27, marking about two months of steady increases and the worst epidemic in years.
The hospitalization rate for flu that week was 51.4 people per...
